Title: Watch the world and your part in there
Description: Look at yourself, the world, the interactions and hold on for a moment to see what's going on.

Title: Try to get it with your mind
Description: The processes are that complex that sometimes a single life cannot be enough. Try to understand parts of it, the more and the deeper the better.

Title: Express it your way
Description: Everyone is unique. Everyone has a part in this world. The work you do is always unique when it comes to art. Do it like you feel it. There are no limits.

Title: Repeat
Description: And get to know you and the world, the more times you repeat, the better.
